body.name: COOFANDY Men's Dress Shirts Short Sleeve Business Wrinkle Free Casual Button Down Shirts
features: 【Premium Fabric】Our men's dress shirts are engineered with superfine denier construction for ultimate wrinkle resistance, modal fabric for a silky feel, high breathability and lightweight fabric designed to keep you dry and comfortable all day.

【Modern Look】This men's short sleeve shirt features a simple urban design with a classic shirt collar, button closure, timeless solid color, and regular fit, cut for the modern man to fit most body types.
【Easy to Match】COOOFANDY men's short sleeve button down shirt can be paired with chinos or jeans for for a casual daily wear or with dress pants for more formal occasions.

【Various Occasion】This mens casual dress shirt is a staple in every man's wardrobe and suitable for a variety of occasions such as weddings, date nights, business, office, street and daily casual. it's an ideal choice whether worn alone or as a base layer.
【Carefree Maintenance】Machine washable. Requires minimal ironing. Please refer to our size chart before ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for money.
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ★★★★★ (5/5)Experience the epitome of style and comfort with COOOFANDY's Men's Short Sleeve Dress Shirt, a versatile wardrobe staple designed to elevate your fashion game. This comprehensive review outlines the exceptional features that make this shirt a standout choice:Premium Fabric (★★★★★):Crafted with precision, these men's dress shirts boast a premium fabric engineered with superfine denier construction. The inclusion of modal fabric not only ensures a silky feel but also enhances breathability, making it a lightweight and comfortable choice that keeps you dry throughout the day. The ultimate wrinkle resistance adds to the convenience, allowing you to maintain a polished look effortlessly.Modern Look (★★★★★):Embrace a modern aesthetic with this men's short sleeve shirt. The urban design features a classic shirt collar, button closure, timeless solid color, and a regular fit tailored to complement most body types. This shirt effortlessly combines timeless style with contemporary flair, making it a versatile addition to your wardrobe.Easy to Match (★★★★★):COOOFANDY's men's short sleeve button-down shirt offers seamless integration into your daily wardrobe. Whether paired with chinos or jeans for casual wear or dressed up with formal pants for special occasions, this shirt effortlessly adapts to your style, offering flexibility for a range of outfit choices.Various Occasion (★★★★★):A true wardrobe essential, this men's casual dress shirt is suitable for a variety of occasions. From weddings and date nights to business meetings and daily casual wear, it effortlessly transitions between different settings. Versatility is key, making it an ideal choice whether worn alone or as a base layer for additional styling options.Carefree Maintenance (★★★★★):Simplify your wardrobe care routine with the COOOFANDY men's dress shirt. Machine washable and requiring minimal ironing, this shirt ensures carefree maintenance without compromising on style or quality. The convenience of easy care adds to the overall appeal of this exceptional garment.Conclusion:Awarded a perfect five-star rating, COOOFANDY's Men's Short Sleeve Dress Shirt stands out for its premium fabric, modern look, easy matchability, suitability for various occasions, and carefree maintenance. Whether you're dressing up for a special event or opting for a casual day out, this shirt effortlessly blends comfort with style. With a commitment to quality and contemporary design, COOOFANDY's shirt is a must-have for the fashion-forward individual. If you seek a short sleeve dress shirt that excels in both form and function, this shirt is a standout choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Another gift for my hubby: a casual shirt that's truly wrinkle-free which makes it a good "grab & go" shirt when it's time to run errands. The blue color looks good and there aren't any negatives about this shirt with the exception of the price. As a couple, we thought the shirt is a little overpriced by at least a couple of dollars. But, in fairness...isn't everything overpriced right now?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another Quality, Good Looking Shirt From Coofandy
reviews.reviewText: I was a little stumped on the Amazon item description which used terms like "denier construction" and "modal fabric" when describing this shirt's construction. With a little looking I found that these terms are both good things having to do with how fine the threads in the material used and what the material is composed of, respectively. In this case, fine thread that comes from beech trees results in an amazingly comfortable and attractive shirt.I ordered the light green color of this short sleeve, button down shirt from Coofandy in an XL size. The sizing chart was really helpful and the fit was spot on in my case. The shirt's seams are tight and in some case doubled up at stress points such as the collar. The buttons are matching in color and relatively small which may be a challenge for ham handed guys like me but not a showstopper by any stretch. The material used in this shirt is extremely smooth and soft and has a silkiness to it as the production description relays. It's definitely a breathable shirt and perfect for late spring through early fall during air conditioning weather. The shirt's fit is great, wears well, and looks good even on my non-model body. This according to my wife who is usually my and my wardrobe's toughest critic.I definitely like this shirt as well as others I have from Coofandy. All in all, this is a good value and comfortable fitting shirt to be sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Los tamaños son demasiado pequeños. Un 2XL es como Mediun en realidad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Another great shirt by Coofandy
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a shirt from Coofandy a couple of months ago and loved it. It was soft, well made and very comfortable. Since then I have ordered three or four more, including this Short Sleeve Business Casual shirt, and they have been consistently great products.The shirt comes vacuum sealed and, surprisingly, when you remove it, there are very few wrinkles except for the fold marks. A quick steam iron takes care of these in minutes. The shirt is perfect for a business casual office (I am wearing it now while at work) or just for a casual daily wearer. There were no loose threads, the seams are tight and the fabric is SUPER soft. The sizing chart included is a bit on the large size. I wear a 44 jacket but ordered a large and it fits me perfectly. The size chart shows a large as 48 though.If you are looking for a nice looking, comfortable shirt, this is a great option. I think that Coofandy is actually a brand that seems to consistently put out quality products. In my opinion, well worth the $25 price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A miss for me
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, I have several shirts from Coofandy. This is the first one that just didn't fit right. I normally fit shirts by chest measurements, and this one indeed fit across the chest just fine, however the shoulders on it are smaller than their other shirts I've tried. If I lift my arms above my head, you expect a shirt to move some, but this one is tight enough through the shoulders that it lifts the entire shirt several inches.There is still a lot of good there. The shirt is a beautiful color and sits nicely as all their shirts have. Someone with a smaller build would definitely have a better time with this particular one though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking shirt
reviews.reviewText: Perfect fit to size. Very comfortable to wear and look great.
